text: Ask a Stupid Question Day was created by teachers in the 1980s to encourage students to ask more questions in the classroom.Ask a Stupid Question Day – The Spark of Yahoo! According to HolidayInsights.com, "at the time, there was a movement by teachers to try to get kids to ask more questions in the classroom. Kids sometimes hold back, fearing their question is stupid, and asking it will result in ridicule."Holiday Insights : May 4 Holiday – Ask a Stupid Question Day ==References== Category:Holidays of the United States Category:September observances
